product_name: Be Expert with Map and Compass - 3rd Edition
long_description: First published in 1955,. Author: Bjorn Kjellstrom. Softcover; 247 pages; black-and-white photographs and illustrations. Updated with internet references, photographs, and tips on using a GPS in conjunction with a map and compass. Offers clear, concise instructions for using a map and compass effectively. Includes practice exercises and an introduciton to the basics of competitve orienteering. Discusses how to solve problems in a variety of orienteering situations.
short_description: First published in 1955, Be Expert with Map and Compass is the classic map and compass instruction book.
